DATABASE_URL.description: The PostgreSQL database url to conect to

DISCORD_TOKEN.description: The Discord API token to use

GOOGLE_KEY.description: The Google key to use to communicate with the YouTube API

MICROSOFT_KEY.description: The Microsoft key to use to communicate with the Microsoft Translator API

MICROSOFT_SECRET.description: The Microsoft secret to use to communicate with the Microsoft Translator API

TZ.description: The timezone for the bot to use when displaying timezones on Discord
